languages.text: The Arbitrator can parry and provide attack of opportunity with a ranged weapon that can shoot at melee range.

traits.locale_text: The Arbitrator can parry and provide attack of opportunity with a ranged weapon that can shoot at melee range.

languages.text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.
languages.original_text: Арбитр может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаки с помощью дистанционного оружия. Для расчета шанса парирования вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} арбитра используется {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}. Арбитр может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} дистанционным оружием, с помощью которого можно {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаковать вблизи{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Arbitrator can parry incoming attacks and make attacks of opportunity with a ranged weapon that can shoot at melee range.

The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

languages.text: Yargıcı, gelen saldırıları menzilli bir silahla {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturabilir{/g}. Savuşturma olasılığını hesaplamak için Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} yerine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliği kullanılır. Yargıcı, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzilinde{/g} kullanabileceği menzilli silahlarla {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırıları{/g} yapabilir.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı, gelen saldırıları menzilli bir silahla {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturabilir{/g}. Savuşturma olasılığını hesaplamak için Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} yerine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliği kullanılır. Yargıcı, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzilinde{/g} kullanabileceği menzilli silahlarla {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırıları{/g} yapabilir.

Yargıcı, gelen saldırıları menzilli bir silahla savuşturabilir. Savuşturma olasılığını hesaplamak için Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} yerine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliği kullanılır. Yargıcı, yakın dövüş menzilinde kullanabileceği menzilli silahlarla fırsat saldırıları yapabilir.

languages.text: El Arbitrator puede {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} ataques usando un arma a distancia. Para calcular la probabilidad de parada se utiliza la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del Arbitrator en vez de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. El Arbitrator puede llevar a cabo {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} con un arma a distancia que sea capaz de usar en alcance {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El Arbitrator puede parar ataques usando un arma a distancia. Para calcular la probabilidad de parada se utiliza la Habilidad de proyectiles del Arbitrator en vez de su Habilidad de armas. El Arbitrator puede llevar a cabo ataques de oportunidad con un arma a distancia que sea capaz de usar en alcance cuerpo a cuerpo.

languages.text: 法务官可以使用远程武器进行{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。计算招架几率时，会使用法务官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}代替{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}进行计算。此外，法务官可以在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内使用远程武器进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 法务官可以使用远程武器进行招架。计算招架几率时，会使用法务官的弹道技能代替武器技能进行计算。此外，法务官可以在近战范围内使用远程武器进行借机攻击。

languages.text: L'arbitrator peut {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} les attaques avec une arme à distance. Le calcul des chances de parade tient compte de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} au lieu de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}. L'arbitrator peut effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} avec une arme à distance utilisable au {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}corps à corps{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'arbitrator peut parer les attaques avec une arme à distance. Le calcul des chances de parade tient compte de sa Capacité de tir au lieu de sa Capacité de combat. L'arbitrator peut effectuer des attaques d'opportunité avec une arme à distance utilisable au corps à corps.

languages.text: アービトレイターは遠隔武器による攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}できる。受け流し確率を計算するため、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}の代わりにアービトレイターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が使われる。アービトレイターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}でも使用可能な遠隔武器で{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができる。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターは遠隔武器による攻撃を受け流しできる。受け流し確率を計算するため、武器スキルの代わりにアービトレイターの弾道スキルが使われる。アービトレイターは近接範囲でも使用可能な遠隔武器で機会攻撃を行うことができる。

languages.text: Der Arbitrator kann Angriffe mit einer Fernkampfwaffe {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Die Berechnung der Parieren-Chance erfolgt nicht über die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, sondern die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} des Arbitrators. Der Arbitrator kann mit einer Fernkampfwaffe {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} ausführen.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Arbitrator kann Angriffe mit einer Fernkampfwaffe parieren. Die Berechnung der Parieren-Chance erfolgt nicht über die Waffenfähigkeit, sondern die Ballistik-Fähigkeit des Arbitrators. Der Arbitrator kann mit einer Fernkampfwaffe Gelegenheitsangriffe im Nahkampf ausführen.

languages.text: Арбитр может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаки с помощью дистанционного оружия. Для расчета шанса парирования вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} арбитра используется {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}. Арбитр может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} дистанционным оружием, с помощью которого можно {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаковать вблизи{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} incoming attacks with a ranged weapon. To calculate the parry chance, the Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. The Arbitrator can make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} with a ranged weapon that they can use in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Арбитр может парировать атаки с помощью дистанционного оружия. Для расчета шанса парирования вместо Ближнего Боя арбитра используется Дальний Бой. Арбитр может совершать атаки по возможности дистанционным оружием, с помощью которого можно атаковать вблизи.

Арбитр может парировать атаки с помощью дистанционного оружия. Для расчета шанса парирования вместо Ближнего Боя арбитра используется Дальний Бой. Арбитр может совершать атаки по возможности дистанционным оружием, с помощью которого можно атаковать вблизи.
